Articles.Content: DECQ, I have decided to give your Buran and Energia a brief showing in my planned upcoming youtube series focused on the American Space shuttle program (because why not!)! Plans currently set to also be using FAR, RSS, and RO. Will this be set up to be compatible with them? I currently have no timeline for when I will get to the Buran except for the historical timeline.

Hi,

where can we find the alpha version ?

> 
> DECQ, I have decided to give your Buran and Energia a brief showing in my planned upcoming youtube series focused on the American Space shuttle program (because why not!)! Plans currently set to also be using FAR, RSS, and RO. Will this be set up to be compatible with them? I currently have no timeline for when I will get to the Buran except for the historical timeline.

Well, it is connected to RSS / RO, but I can not vouch for the accuracy of performance. It would be really interesting to see the video.

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Hi,
> where can we find the alpha version ?

Alpha version does not exist, but it may soon appear.

Although something again confuse all cards :-\

> 
> Well, it is connected to RSS / RO, but I can not vouch for the accuracy of performance. It would be really interesting to see the video.
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> Alpha version does not exist, but it may soon appear.
> 
> Although something again confuse all cards :-\

ok, I just received a communication from Dragon01 stating that he is not quite done with the cfg files for RSS/RO for this shuttle yet. It seems I will need to wait on that, but I am CERTAIN that this will show itself in my series at the section of time in which it appeared irl! Also, waitng on the guys making Real KSC mod to release a download for it! Once that is done, I will begin the filming of the series!
how is it going?

> 
> how is it going?

Hi, I check lags, and wait for the aerodynamics of the Dragon).

Hey DECQ, just to answer an open question, if you want to make buran compatabile with SSP payloads, i will not argue, but it will be on your own perogative. However, NONE of our payloads are to show up in the pack.

> 
> Hey DECQ, just to answer an open question, if you want to make buran compatabile with SSP payloads, i will not argue, but it will be on your own perogative. However, NONE of our payloads are to show up in the pack.

 did not watch Buran compatibility SSP, do not understand your question, do you mean ISS ?.

> 
> did not watch Buran compatibility SSP, do not understand your question, do you mean ISS ?.

Dragon was inquiring about the possibility of making the SSP payloads compatible with you Buran. I was just giving my permission to do so with the stipulation that our payloads are not to show up in the pack itself.

> 
> Dragon was inquiring about the possibility of making the SSP payloads compatible with you Buran. I was just giving my permission to do so with the stipulation that our payloads are not to show up in the pack itself.

Okay, I understand.

I don't mind if my payloads are included with or used by the buran.

if you think they are good enough to be used, have fun with them
DECQ are you going to update your Saturn V to current build its very good and should be available

> 
> I don't mind if my payloads are included with or used by the buran.
>  if you think they are good enough to be used, have fun with them

 Mike. To be honest this is not my initiative, I did not even think about it. Although I have not seen your work but I do not think they are as bad as you imagine them.

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> DECQ are you going to update your Saturn V to current build its very good and should be available

 Hello Virtualgenius, now I take greater "Energia" Dragon tuned aerodynamics for Buran, it is a good entry into the atmosphere and sits well. Sometimes I modify the Saturn V, I have recently worked to improve S-II is also not pleased with the textures, in any case, I will working it, although I think that it will not be popular, have a lot of good work on the Apollo program.

PS Incidentally, at the aero approach will improve flight in the atmosphere.

[![9968932_m.png](http://images.vfl.ru/ii/1443003307/6b71e532/9968932_m.png)](http://vfl.ru/fotos/6b71e5329968932.html)

[![9968937_m.png](http://images.vfl.ru/ii/1443003373/f2cc3103/9968937_m.png)](http://vfl.ru/fotos/f2cc31039968937.html)

[![9968957_m.png](http://images.vfl.ru/ii/1443003407/c251dc63/9968957_m.png)](http://vfl.ru/fotos/c251dc639968957.html)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-23T10:17:00Z" title="09/23/2015 10:17  AM" data-short="8 yr">September 23, 2015</time> by DECQ**
I see jet engines!
Yup, those are AL-31, non-afterburning version of the AL-31F engine used on Su-27.

many beautiful pictures.

no alpha version.

no trial version.

just a fake ?

> 
> many beautiful pictures.
> no alpha version.
> 
> no trial version.
> 
> just a fake ?

He's working on it. Be patient.

> 
> many beautiful pictures.
> no alpha version.
> 
> no trial version.
> 
> just a fake ?

No, it's not a fake :-\

Just not much time to finalize it soon, as there are other projects that I'm working.

Why fake ? 

DECQ is great guy and has a lot of work right now ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

So let us wait

[SIZE=3]Hello everyone, so happened that yesterday 15 November start the first and last flight of Buran, and today I'm releasing him, after more than one year Page add-on "Energy project" is updated and I'm extremely happy !!! Version 1.3 is available on the home page of the project.  

[/SIZE]http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/88105-Energy-project-%28First-Version%29?p=1302808#post1302808  

[SIZE=3]  

[/SIZE]While on this project is still a lot of work, because there is ENERGIA-M, VULKAN, older types of BURAN. ;)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-11-16T18:35:06Z" title="11/16/2015 06:35  PM" data-short="8 yr">November 16, 2015</time> by DECQ**

[quote name='DECQ'][SIZE=3]Hello everyone, so happened that yesterday 15 November start the first and last flight of Buran, and today I'm releasing him, after more than one year Page add-on "Energy project" is updated and I'm extremely happy !!! Version 1.3 is available on the home page of the project.  

[/SIZE]http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/88105-Energy-project-%28First-Version%29?p=1302808#post1302808  

[SIZE=3]  

[/SIZE]While on this project is still a lot of work, because there is ENERGIA-M, VULKAN, older types of BURAN. ;)[/QUOTE]  

congrats buddy, good work, will test now
Ok, this is the perfect birthday present (yeah, my birthday was on the 14th, but close enough) Can't wait to fly this.

[quote name='Tristonwilson12']congrats buddy, good work, will test now[/QUOTE]  

Thank you!!! I and Dragon tormented him for a long time, and it was very nice to let even one day after the real flight :-)  

[COLOR="silver"][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]  

[quote name='Sampa']Ok, this is the perfect birthday present (yeah, my birthday was on the 14th, but close enough) Can't wait to fly this.[/QUOTE]  

Oh, I congratulate you on the last birthday! I'm glad to please you.
